sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Historic Needit Data">0adf041447763110bd8cf164336d43a3</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[// Ensure that the source and target objects are GlideRecord objects
if (source instanceof GlideRecord && target instanceof GlideRecord) {
  // Check if the u_requested_for_email field is empty in the source record
  if (source.u_requested_for_email.nil()) {
    // Check if the u_requested_for field is not empty
    if (!source.u_requested_for.nil()) {
      // Create the email address
      var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
      target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
    } else {
      // Handle the case where u_requested_for is empty
      gs.debug("u_requested_for is empty in source record");
    }
  } else {
    // Handle the case where u_requested_for_email is already populated in the source record
    gs.debug("u_requested_for_email is already populated in source record");
  }
} else {
  // Handle the case where source or target is not a valid GlideRecord
  gs.error("Invalid GlideRecord objects provided");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-24 21:59:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>541e9c5447b63110bd8cf164336d4384</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_541e9c5447b63110bd8cf164336d4384</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-24 21:59:09</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
